error.invalid_account_format: The account is not a hex value, please use only 0-9 and A-F.
error.invalid_account_length: The account is not the right length, it has to be between 3 and 16 characters.
error.invalid_key_format: The key is not a hex value, please use only 0-9 and A-F.
error.invalid_key_length: The key is not the right length, it has to be 16, 24 or 32 hex characters.
error.invalid_ping: The ping interval needs to be between 1 and 1440 minutes.
